column4: I'm new to linux, and I'm trying to put it onto an aged laptop (4 years old) with 190 mb of RAM, I'm trying to boot it just from the CD right now, but it's really slow. Will it run ok if I just go ahead and install it?
Old laptop, came with 256, then I suppose it got corrupt, I never bothered upgrading because it served my needs, and now I've got a new laptop with 4 gigs.
Maybe try Xubuntu, or something less RAM heavy.
